Austan Goolsbee: University of Chicago Economics Professor, former Head of CEA
Thomas Piketty: French Economist famous for his book Capital in the 21st Century
William Tecumseh Sherman: Union Civil War General noted for his excursions into Atlanta
Matt Taibbi: Freelance writer, formerly of the Exile, NY Press, and Rolling Stone
Will Leitch: Founder of Deadspin, contributor to several publications.
Bob Dylan: A traditional folk musician whose later work experimented with the format
Norm MacDonald: Canadian SNL alumni whose humor is dry and absurd
Adam Thielen: Undrafted from Mankato State, he is now regarded as top player.
Kirk Cousins: Formerly of the Washington Football team, Cousins has offered consistency to an otherwise chaotic team
Kyle Rudolph: Starting Tight End noted for his charitable contributions
